recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of firm tofu, pressed and cut into cubes| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of soy sauce| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of sriracha sauce| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of honey| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of lime juice| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of ginger, minced| Untimed; None; In a bowl, whisk together olive oil, soy sauce, sriracha sauce, honey, lime juice, garlic, and ginger| Untimed; None; Add tofu cubes to the marinade and let sit for 30 minutes| Untimed; None; Preheat grill to medium-high heat| Untimed; None; Thread marinated tofu onto skewers| Timed; 900; Grill skewers for 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally, until tofu is golden brown| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Grilled Tofu Skewers with Sriracha Sauce
